content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam power generation system at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position (0.5, 6.0)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 0.5)

### Iron plate production facility at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-5.0, -65.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (47.0, -82.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (46.5, -83.5), (48.5, -83.5), (5.5, -79.5), (10.5, -79.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
(No updates in this section)

### Copper cable factory
(No updates in this section)

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups located at various positions, facilitating fluid transport.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing inventory items
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place or connect entities. For example, you cannot place the Offshore Pump if it is not in your inventory.

### Errors when trying to connect Boiler to Steam Engine
- Make sure to have pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. Without pipes, the connection cannot be established.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities occupying the desired position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
